comment: This professor made taking a condensed (summer semester) online course less stressful. Great experience. I would highly recommend taking Dr. Pearcey's courses. The program used for the online assignments is a bit challenging, but overall it helped me learn the material. Dr. Pearcey was understanding when it came to unprecedented life events.

Awesome professor! The material is tough but it's easy enough if you read the textbook and the powerpoints she provides. There are weekly discussion posts, 4 article assignments (easy!), 13 quizzes (3-4 per exam) and 3 exams. She's big on plagiarizing, so make sure you use your own words for assignments :)
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: I LOVE Dr. Pearcy, she is so passionate about psych and is always willing to go over a concept again. Haven't taken Bio since HS, but she made the subject really approachable. She is SO fair with her grading, and will take off test questions if they were unclear/she didn't cover it well enough. TAKE HER!!! oh, and make sure you go to class :)

EXCELLENT TEACHER!  Five exams(not cumulative), one 3 page paper, and a brief presentation.  Attendance not mandatory but showing up and taking notes is a good choice.  Classes are fun and very interesting.  I can honestly say I never sat through a boring lecture in this class  She is very helpful and caring.  Highly recommended
Psychopharm isn't easy but Pearcey is a great professor. You'll always know what will be on the test and she's always willing to answer questions.

One of the best teachers in the psych department(probably why shes the dp head)! Her powerpoints are so detailed and very easy to follow. Her tests are half multiple choice and she gives you choices to pick from for short answer. If you are having a hard time understanding she will help you understand before she continues on with new material.

I'm not sure why the previous reviewer had such a bad experience. My interaction with her as the head of the department has been very positive. She has gone out of her way to help me, review my classes needed to graduate, offer suggestions etc.

I havent actually had her as a professor but I've met with her as the head of the department and I have to say that I have never felt so belittled in my life. She is rude and plays favorites, and should NOT be in a place of position. The way she handles students makes me want to reconsider my whole academic career! She willnot treat you with respec

Awesome professor. She made the class fun and was very knowledgeable about the material. However, tests are rather difficult and it is almost impossible to pull out an A. She is willing to help and work with you though. Would definitely recommend this teacher if you want to learn something, even though she is hard.

Dr Pearcey is an okay prof if you have had her in a prior class. The problem is she teaches to students who have already had her, which can be difficult if you haven't and very frustrating. Do not take her if you need a lot of detail and to know exactly what you are doing. I felt lost many times in her Experimental course.

Very tough class, but just because she uses a test bank for the tests, which sometimes covers stuff she didnt cover in class.  Very helpful and mainly        just uses powerpoints and videos-laid back.

Dr. Pearcey is one of the best psychology professors at KSU.  The material she teaches can be hard but she explains things very well.  You have to study and practice the problems to do well in her class.  She is very interested in helping students that need it.  I took her for Research methods and Experimental Psych.
Hands down the best teacher at Kennesaw. I'd take her for every class if I could. I also took her for physio. The classes she teaches are hard but it's worth it because she's so nice!
Awesome teacher. Nuff said.

GREATEST TEACHER IN PSYCH DEPT. I would take her for every psych class if that was possible.  Lectures are straight to the point and what is needed to be known for the test. Works with you and wants you to succeed.  Any class with her name on it, TAKE IT!!!!!!!!!!
tough class, lots of info, good prof that is willing to help and answer questions.  good class

Easy, fun and interesting lectures.  Not necessary to thoroughly read the text-- just take good notes in class and review her major points in the book and you'll be fine. The book's online resources are wonderful test study tools, especially the quizzes because she uses test bank questions on the test.

Excellent Professor. She makes sure you know the material, and enjoys doing so. Willing to help whenever you need it, and makes the class interesting and fun. She combines the class and the lab- somewhat- which makes things much easier to learn and understand. Tests are exactly what we went over in class, and she helps alot with APA style. Take her
She is one of the best professors I have had at this school. Test are m/c, short ans. She truely enjoys teaching and helping her students. Better know your APA style.
Tough class, lots of info, ...great prof...makes it fun, and interesting, no attendance policy...exams are m/c and essay..
the best teacher!!!!funny, friendly, helpful, clear...makes class interesting
Awesome professor!  Real situations are used to help you learn the information you need.  You will learn a great deal in her class.
WONDERFUL!!! Easy, helpful, funny, friendly...
